entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call is important to us. Please wait while we connect you to the next available agent.
Finally! I've been on hold forever. I need to return something.
Thank you for calling VeloFit. My name is Sarah, and I'd be happy to assist you with your return today. What item are you looking to return?
It's a VeloBand Pulse. I'm not happy with it. Doesn't track my sleep properly. Waste of money.
I understand. Can you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with the purchase?
It's under john.doe@email.com. I bought it like, 2 weeks ago.

Thank you, Mr. Doe. Let me pull up your order. Okay, I see the VeloBand Pulse purchase here. To initiate the return, can you confirm the reason for the return? As you mentioned, is it related to inaccurate sleep tracking?
Yes! Exactly! The sleep tracking is completely off. I want to return it. What's the return process?

Okay, Mr. Doe. Our standard return policy allows for returns within 90 days of purchase for a full refund, provided the item is in good condition. Since you're within that window, the return shouldn't be a problem at all. We aim for complete customer satisfaction, even if the smart watch isn't a great fit.
90 days? Seriously? That's great! Some companies only give you like, 10 days. This VeloBand Pulse thing really isn't working for me.

Yes, sir, our policy allows ample time for returns. I'll go ahead and generate a prepaid shipping label for you. You should receive it in your email within the next few minutes, along with instructions on how to package the VeloBand Pulse for return. Just box it up and drop it off at the nearest shipping location. Once we receive the returned item, we'll process the refund back to your original payment method.
Perfect! This is much easier than I expected. I was expecting a huge hassle. No need to get a manager involved, I guess.
Not at all, Mr. Doe. We want to make the return process as smooth as possible. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's all. Thank you so much for your help. I appreciate it.
You're very welcome, Mr. Doe. Have a great day!
